casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Aleshire, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Aleshire, 117 Ohio St.3d 402, 2008-Ohio-1272.]

(No. 2007-1865 Submitted March 12, 2008 Decided March 26, 2008.) Lonnie J. Aleshire Jr., pro se.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Sarkozy, 117 Ohio St.3d 86, 2008-Ohio-509, 881 N.E.2d 1224, the guilty plea is vacated, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for retrial.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents. Cupp, J., dissents and would dismiss the cause as having been improvidently accepted.
